about.description:
Craftr is a next generation build system based on Ninja and Python that
features modular and cross-platform build definitions at the flexibility of a
Python script and provides access to multiple levels of build automation
abstraction.
about.summary: Meta build system based on Ninja and Python

name: craftr

new_version_errors.2.0.0:
The recipe did not change in the version migration, a URL did not hash, or there is jinja2 syntax the bot cannot handle!

Please check the URLs in your recipe with version '2.0.0' to make sure they exist!

We also found the following errors:

 - could not hash URL template 'https://github.com/craftr-build/craftr/archive/v2.0.0.dev5.tar.gz'

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "craftr" %}
{% set version = "2.0.0.dev5" %}
{% set sha256 = "39028c3ca3cb8cc7598d62970b19c235c050e3a483dd10fbc6d2d95b4fe5acce" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://github.com/craftr-build/craftr/archive/v2.0.0.dev5.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt
  number: 0
  skip: True  # [py2k or py36]

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - colorama ==0.3.7
    - glob2 ==0.5
    - jsonschema ==2.5.1
    - ninja
    - ninja_syntax ==1.6.0
    - nr ==1.3.5
    - termcolor ==1.1.0
    - werkzeug ==0.11.11

test:
  commands:
    - craftr -h

about:
  home: https://craftr.net
  license: GPL-3.0
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'Meta build system based on Ninja and Python'
  description: |
    Craftr is a next generation build system based on Ninja and Python that
    features modular and cross-platform build definitions at the flexibility of a
    Python script and provides access to multiple levels of build automation
    abstraction.
  doc_url: http://craftr.readthedocs.io
  dev_url: https://github.com/craftr-build/craftr

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - dfroger
